issue.title: [Docs] Remove page for "Compute IR"
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17716](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17716). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-16740 removed the IR consumer, but there is still a documentation page referencing IR:

    <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/developers/computeir.html>

 

We should remove the documentation page to avoid confusion

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17716?focusedCommentId=17603695) by Aldrin Montana (octalene):*
linking ARROW-16740 which removed the IR consumer

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17716?focusedCommentId=17604057) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14112
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14112>
